fields.description: Indicates the number of inactive days to be considered for site deletion
fields.label: Inactive For Days

fields.description: Indicates the number of days after which site will be deleted
fields.label: Warning Days

fields.description: Indicates the number of day on which intermittent warning will be sent
fields.label: Intermittent Warning Day

fields.description: Limits the number of sites to be deleted at once
fields.label: Limit

fields.description: Indicates the number of expired days to be considered for site deletion
fields.label: Expired For Days

fields.description: This template is for deletion success warning only. All the rest of  warnings are sent through Notification
fields.label: Deletion Warning Template

fields.description: The deletion task will run at this hours interval
fields.label: Run At Interval
